sender_info.physical_address: Your Street Address, City, State/Province, Country, Postal Code
sender_info._note: Physical address is REQUIRED by CAN-SPAM Act

unsubscribe._note: You MUST create this unsubscribe page - see integration guide

rate_limits._daily_note: Conservative limit - 50 emails per day maximum
rate_limits._hourly_note: Spread emails throughout the day - 10 per hour max
rate_limits._domain_note: Don't flood same organization - 5 per domain max
rate_limits._burst_note: Prevents sudden bursts that look like spam

targeting._days_note: Don't contact same person within 90 days

personalization._name_note: Skip contacts without names - shows you did research

compliance._note: ALL of these should be true for compliance

smtp._note: Never commit passwords - use environment variables or secrets

tracking._note: Keep detailed logs for compliance and improvement

safety._dryrun_note: Always test with --dry-run before live sending
safety._size_note: Don't allow campaigns over 100 emails without review

professional_guidelines._purpose: These are YOUR ethical guidelines - enforce them
professional_guidelines._relevant_note: Only contact people relevant to your field/goals
professional_guidelines._personal_note: Each email should be genuinely personalized
professional_guidelines._genuine_note: Be honest about your intent - no deception
professional_guidelines._response_note: If someone says no or doesn't respond, respect it
